extensionDescription.message: An intelligent URL redirection tool - supports multiple matching modes and URL template replacement.

extensionDefaultTitle.description: The default title for the browser action.

popupTitle.description: The title of the popup window.

popupStatusOn.description: The ON status on the switch.

popupStatusOff.description: The OFF status on the switch.

optionsTitle.description: The title of the options page.

optionsSwitchLabel.description: Label for the main extension enable/disable switch.

optionsSwitchStatusOn.description: Text indicating the switch is on.

optionsSwitchStatusOff.description: Text indicating the switch is off.

textOn.description: Generic 'ON' text, used in CSS switches.

textOff.description: Generic 'OFF' text, used in CSS switches.

optionsRulesConfigHeader.description: Header for the rule configuration panel.

optionsOnlineDocsLink.description: Link text for online documentation and testing.

optionsRulesPlaceholder.message: Please enter your redirection rules here, one rule per line. Format: sourceURL####targetURL
optionsRulesPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text for the redirection rules textarea.

optionsGuideTab.description: Tab title for the user guide.

optionsTestToolTab.description: Tab title for the test tool.

guideRedirectMessage.message: The complete user guide, advanced feature descriptions, and all test cases have been moved to the online documentation to provide more timely updates and a better reading experience.
guideRedirectMessage.description: Message to inform users that the guide has moved online.

guideRedirectLink.message: Click here to visit the online documentation
guideRedirectLink.description: Link text to the online documentation.

guideHeader.description: Header for the user guide section.

testToolHeader.description: Header for the redirect test tool section.

testToolUrlLabel.description: Label for the test URL input.

testToolUrlPlaceholder.message: Enter a URL to test, e.g., https://example.com/path
testToolUrlPlaceholder.description: Placeholder for the test URL input.

testToolTestButton.description: Text for the test redirect button.

logsHeader.description: Header for the test logs section.

logsLevelLabel.description: Label for the log level selector.

logsCopyButton.description: Text for the copy logs button.

logsClearButton.description: Text for the clear logs button.

logsNoLogs.message: No logs yet. Please run a redirect test first.
logsNoLogs.description: Message shown when there are no logs to display.

choseTitle.description: Title of the multiple matches choice page.

choseHeader.message: ðŸ”— Select a link to open
choseHeader.description: Header text on the choice page.

choseSubheader.message: The following redirection options were matched. Click any link to proceed.
choseSubheader.description: Subheader text on the choice page.

choseLoading.description: Loading message on the choice page.

choseEmptyStateHeader.description: Header for the empty state on the choice page.

choseEmptyStateMessage.message: No redirection rules were matched for the current page.
choseEmptyStateMessage.description: Message for the empty state on the choice page.

choseTimeoutHeader.description: Header for the timeout state on the choice page.

choseTimeoutMessage.message: Could not retrieve redirection options. Please refresh the page and try again.
choseTimeoutMessage.description: Message for the timeout state on the choice page.

options_getConfigError.message:
# Failed to get config: $ERROR$
# Please enter the configuration manually or check your network connection
options_getConfigError.description: Error message when failing to get config.

options_statusUpdateFailed.description: Error message when failing to update extension status.

options_switchInitFailed.description: Error message when failing to initialize the switch.

options_save_success.message: Saved successfully! The new rules are now in effect.

options_cycle_found_header.description: Header for redirection loop found message.

options_enter_test_url.message: Please enter a URL to test.
options_enter_test_url.description: Alert message to enter a test URL.

options_config_rules_first.description: Alert message to configure rules first.

options_test_error_message.message: An error occurred during the test. Please check if the rule format is correct.

options_no_logs_yet.description: Message when there are no logs.

options_no_logs_to_copy.description: Message when there are no logs to copy.

options_logs_copied.description: Message when logs are copied successfully.

options_copy_failed.message: Copy failed. Please select and copy manually.

options_copy_failed_error.description: Message when copy fails with an error.

options_error_configManagerNotLoaded.description: Error message when ConfigManager is not loaded.

options_error_configManagerNotLoaded_ins.message:
# Error: Configuration Manager not loaded
# Please refresh the page and try again
options_error_configManagerNotLoaded_ins.description: Error message and instructions when ConfigManager fails to load.

redEngLogNoLogs.description: Message in log export when there are no logs.

redEngLogTime.description: Label for generation time in log export.

redEngLogCount.description: Label for log count in log export.

redEngLogData.description: Label for data in log export.

redEngCycleDetected.description: Error message for cyclic redirection in test tool.

redEngNoRuleMatched.description: Message when no rule is matched in test tool.

redEngChainEnd.description: Message when redirect chain ends in test tool.

redEngMultipleMatches.description: Message for multiple matches in test tool.

redEngMaxRedirects.message: Reached max redirection limit ($1 steps), stopping test
redEngMaxRedirects.description: Message when max redirection steps are reached in test tool.

redEngLogProtocolExists.message: Pattern already contains protocol, returning directly

redEngLogNoPlaceholder.message: Template has no placeholders, returning directly

redEngLogTemplateUrlNoProtocol.message: Template replacement: URL has no protocol, trying to match with added protocol

redEngLogTemplateHttpSuccess.message: Template replacement: Matched successfully after adding http:// protocol

redEngLogTemplateHttpsSuccess.message: Template replacement: Matched successfully after adding https:// protocol

redEngLogUrlNoMatchTemplate.message: URL does not match pattern, cannot perform template replacement

redEngLogTargetUrlHasProtocol.message: Target URL already has a protocol

redEngLogTargetUrlRelative.message: Target URL is a relative path, keeping as is

redEngLogUrlNoProtocol.message: URL has no protocol, trying to match with added protocol

redEngLogHttpMatchSuccess.message: Matched successfully after adding http:// protocol

redEngLogHttpsMatchSuccess.message: Matched successfully after adding https:// protocol

redEngLogUrlDecodeFail.message: URL decoding failed, using raw string: $1

redEngLogUrlExtractFail.message: Failed to extract content from URL

redEngLogTargetUrlEmpty.message: Target URL is empty, trying to extract from URL

redEngLogUrlExtractInvalid.message: Failed to extract a valid URL, skipping rule

redEngLogTemplateReplaceFail.message: Template replacement failed, using normalized original target URL
